WITH PD_INF AS ( SELECT T1.PD_CD , T1.PD_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_GRP_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL04 AS LP_USE_YN /* , T2.PD_PRP_VAL17 AS MAT_MNGT_DV_CD */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MAT_MNGT_DV_CD', T2.PD_PRP_VAL17, 'ko') AS MAT_MNGT_DV_CD , T1.PDCT_UPRC , T1.SAP_MAT_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL30 AS TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN , T2.PD_PRP_VAL21 AS CMN_PART_DV_CD /* 중수리 01 */ , T2.PD_PRP_VAL15 AS ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN /* 기초자재 Y 상시보유 */ FROM WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 /*상품기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD /* AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD IN ('SPP', 'SCHD', 'PDCT') */ /*상품확장속성그룹코드 CMN 공통, AFS AS, PRC 가격, STLM 결제, CNTR 계약, EXCH 교환/반품, ETC 기타, SL 매출, GO 발주, SPP 배송, ANA 분석, FEE 영업수수료, HIST 이력, SCHD 일정관리, COCN 전집, LRNN 학습/외국어, LV 학습단계, PART AS부품, FINC 재무, PDCT 판매제품*/ WHERE 1=1 AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4'
AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 = #{pdGrpCd} /* 상품그룹 */
AND T1.PD_CD = #{pdCd} /* 상품코드 */
) , TEMP AS ( SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , PRTNR_NO FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY T.CNTR_NO, T.CNTR_SN ORDER BY VST_FSH_DT DESC ) RN , CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , PRTNR_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T WHERE SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '2' ) WHERE RN = 1 ) , OG_INF_PRTNR AS ( SELECT T1.BASE_YM , T1.PRTNR_NO , T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.PRTNR_KNM , T1.OG_ID , T1.OG_CD , T1.OG_NM , T1.HMNRSC_DEPT_CD /*인사부서코드*/ , T3.HGR_OG_ID , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY T1.PRTNR_NO ORDER BY T3.HGR_OG_ID) AS RN FROM WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 /*월파트너내역*/ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /*파트너기본*/ ON T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T1.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /*월조직내역*/ ON T1.OG_ID = T3.OG_ID AND T1.BASE_YM = T3.BASE_YM AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') /*AND (T1.PRTNR_NO IN (SELECT ICHR_PRTNR_NO FROM TEMP1) OR T1.PRTNR_NO IN (SELECT PRTNR_NO FROM TEMP1) OR T1.PRTNR_NO IN (SELECT FST_RGST_USR_ID FROM TEMP1))*/ AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('HR1', 'W02', 'W03','W06') /*조직유형코드 W01 P추진, W02 M추진, W03 홈마스터, W04 B2B, W05 온라인총판, W06 엔지니어, ALC 제휴채널, HR1 임직원, BND 채권, L01 라이프, X01 KLC, X02 LC전문강사*/ AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT C1.CNTR_NO , C1.CNTR_SN , PD_INF.SAP_MAT_CD , PD_INF.PD_CD , PD_INF.PD_NM , A1.NEW_ADR_ZIP , B1.BRCH_OG_ID , (SELECT OG_CD FROM TB_OGBS_OG_BAS WHERE B1.BRCH_OG_ID = OG_ID) AS BRCH_OG_CD /* 영업센터 */ , (SELECT OG_NM FROM TB_OGBS_OG_BAS WHERE B1.BRCH_OG_ID = OG_ID) AS BRCH_OG_NM /* 영업센터이름 (지역단) */ , OG_INF_PRTNR.OG_NM /* 서비스센터 */ , A1.RDADR||' '||A1.RDADR AS ADDR , T4.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , T4.MEXNO_ENCR , T4.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T4.LOCARA_TNO , T4.EXNO_ENCR , T4.IDV_TNO , C2.IST_DT , C2.CAN_DT , C2.REQD_DT , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', C3.SELL_TP_CD, 'ko') AS SELL_TP_NM , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PD_USWY_CD', C2.PD_USWY_CD, 'ko') AS PD_USWY_CD , C1.BC_NO , C2.SV_STP_DT , C3.CNTR_PTRM , C1.EXT_FRISU_AS_MCN , C3.SV_PRD , T4.RCGVP_KNM , OG_INF_PRTNR.HMNRSC_DEPT_CD /* 웰스매니저 소속 */ , OG_INF_PRTNR.PRTNR_KNM /* 웰스매니저 */ , OG_INF_PRTNR.PRTNR_NO /* 웰스매니저 사번 */ , NVL((SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(D1.DLQ_ACU_MCN), 'N') FROM TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS D1 WHERE C1.CNTR_NO = D1.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = D1.CNTR_SN AND EOT_DLQ_ADD_AMT > 0 AND D1.PERF_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')),'0') AS DLQ_ACU_MCN /* 연체여부 */ , PD_INF.TRNOVR_RT_OJ_YN , PD_INF.CMN_PART_DV_CD /* 중수리 01 */ , PD_INF.ORDNY_HV_MAT_YN /* 기초자재 Y 상시보유 */ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ C1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ C2 /* AC202 월별고객서비스대상내역 */ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = C2.CNTR_SN AND C2.MNGT_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C3 /*계약상세*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C3.CNTR_NO AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN GBSDBS.TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS A1 ON C2.ADR_ID = A1.ADR_ID /*이해욱이사님,이진성프로님과 협의 설치, AS는 배정시에 주소를 사용 해야 하기 때문에 TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ 에 ADR_ID 를 추가 하기로 함. 테이블이 변경 되면, T4.ADR_ID 를 T1.ADR_ID 으로 수정 해야 함*/ AND A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN PD_INF ON C1.PDCT_PD_CD = PD_INF.PD_CD INNER JOIN TEMP ON C1.CNTR_NO = TEMP.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = TEMP.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN OG_INF_PRTNR ON TEMP.PRTNR_NO = OG_INF_PRTNR.PRTNR_NO AND OG_INF_PRTNR.RN = 1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = T3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = T3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND T3.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' /*1 계약주소, 2 배달주소, 3 설치주소*/ AND C2.MNGT_YM BETWEEN T3.VL_STRT_DTM AND T3.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T4 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID /*계약주소지ID*/ AND C2.ADR_ID = T4.ADR_ID AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN ( SELECT NEW_ADR_ZIP , BRCH_OG_ID , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY NEW_ADR_ZIP ORDER BY CH_SN DESC) AS RN FROM TB_SVPD_LOCARA_BFSVC_OGMGR_IZ ) B1 ON A1.NEW_ADR_ZIP = B1.NEW_ADR_ZIP AND B1.RN = 1 WHERE 1=1
AND C2.IST_NMN_N = #{instOver} /* 설치차월 */
AND C3.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd} /* 판매유형 */
AND C3.SV_PRD = #{bfsvcPrdCd} /* 주기 */
AND (C2.CAN_DT IS NOT NULL OR C2.REQD_DT IS NOT NULL)
